mapper.update:
update t_icksl a set a.ickslid=a.ickslid
where 1=1
mapper.select:
select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from (select a.ryid ryid,a.ickslid ickslid,a.kh kh,a.ickh ickh,a.slyy slyy,a.slr slr,a.slsj slsj,a.yxsksrq yxsksrq,a.yxqhzrq yxqhzrq,a.cjsj cjsj,a.cjr cjr,a.cjdbm cjdbm,a.cjdmc cjdmc,a.jssj jssj,a.jsbmc jsbmc,a.ffr ffr,a.ffsj ffsj,a.lqr lqr,a.lqsj lqsj,a.lqrzjlx lqrzjlx,a.lqrzjhm lqrzjhm,a.ickzxr ickzxr,a.ickzxsj ickzxsj,a.ickzxyy ickzxyy,a.njr njr,a.njsj njsj,a.zkztbs zkztbs,a.sfqr sfqr,a.ysr ysr,a.yssj yssj,a.dxrr dxrr,a.dxrsj dxrsj,a.cyssj cyssj,a.cysyy cysyy,a.cdxrsj cdxrsj,a.cdxryy cdxryy,a.bhkyy bhkyy,a.yksfsh yksfsh from t_icksl a where 1=1
order by ${pageSort}) z) x where rowno >${beginRow} and rowno <= ${endRow}
select count(1) a from t_icksl a where 1=1

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from (select a.ryid,a.qyid,a.cyrybh,a.cyrylbdm,a.cyrylbmc,a.gwbh,a.gwmc,a.xm,a.xbdm,a.xb,a.cyzjdm,a.cyzj,a.zjhm,a.zt,a.lrsj lrsj, c.qymc qymc,c.qybm qybm,c.qyzt qyzt,a.hylbdm hylbdm,a.hylb hylb,cylb,cylbdm from t_qyryxx a ,t_qyry_zp b,(select qyid,qymc,qybm,zt qyzt from t_qyjbxx where scbz=0) c where 1=1 and a.ryid=b.ryid and a.qyid=c.qyid and b.tplx='0' and a.scbz=0 and a.zxbz='0' and a.ryid not in (select ryid from t_icksl where (zkztbs <> '7' and zkztbs <> '9')) and b.tpnr is not null
order by ${pageSort}) z) x where rowno >${beginRow} and rowno <= ${endRow}

select count(1) a from t_qyryxx a ,t_qyry_zp b,(select qyid,qymc,qybm,zt qyzt from t_qyjbxx where scbz=0) c where 1=1 and a.ryid=b.ryid and a.qyid=c.qyid and b.tplx='0' and a.scbz=0 and a.zxbz='0' and a.ryid not in (select ryid from t_icksl where (zkztbs <> '7' and zkztbs <> '9')) and b.tpnr is not null

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from (select a.ryid, a.ickslid, a.kh, a.ickh,a.yxqhzrq, b.xm,b.xbdm,b.xb,b.cyrylbdm,b.cyrybh,d.wlpc,e.qyid,e.qymc from t_icksl a, t_qyryxx b, t_icksl_wldj c, t_wldj d, t_qyjbxx e where a.ryid = b.ryid and a.ickslid = c.ickslid and c.wlid = d.wlid and b.qyid = e.qyid and b.scbz = 0 and e.scbz = 0
order by ${pageSort}) z) x where rowno >${beginRow} and rowno <= ${endRow}

select count(1) a from t_icksl a, t_qyryxx b, t_icksl_wldj c, t_wldj d, t_qyjbxx e where a.ryid = b.ryid and a.ickslid = c.ickslid and c.wlid = d.wlid and b.qyid = e.qyid and b.scbz = 0 and e.scbz = 0

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from (select a.ickslid,b.ryid,b.qyid,b.cyrybh,b.cylb,b.cylbdm,b.cyrylbdm,b.xm,b.xbdm,b.xb,b.cyzjdm,b.cyzj,b.zjhm,b.zt,b.lrsj cjsj, e.qymc qymc,e.qybm qybm from t_icksl a, t_qyryxx b, t_qyjbxx e where a.ryid = b.ryid and b.qyid = e.qyid and b.scbz = 0 and e.scbz = 0 and a.zkztbs = '6'
order by ${pageSort}) z) x where rowno >${beginRow} and rowno <= ${endRow}
select count(1) a from t_icksl a, t_qyryxx b, t_qyjbxx e where a.ryid = b.ryid and b.qyid = e.qyid and b.scbz = 0 and e.scbz = 0 and a.zkztbs = '6'

select a.ryid ryid,a.ickslid ickslid,a.kh kh,a.ickh ickh,a.slyy slyy,a.slr slr,a.slsj slsj,a.yxsksrq yxsksrq,a.yxqhzrq yxqhzrq,a.cjsj cjsj,a.cjr cjr,a.cjdbm cjdbm,a.cjdmc cjdmc,a.jssj jssj,a.jsbmc jsbmc,a.ffr ffr,a.ffsj ffsj,a.lqr lqr,a.lqsj lqsj,a.lqrzjlx lqrzjlx,a.lqrzjhm lqrzjhm,a.ickzxr ickzxr,a.ickzxsj ickzxsj,a.ickzxyy ickzxyy,a.njr njr,a.njsj njsj,a.zkztbs zkztbs,a.sfqr sfqr,a.ysr ysr,a.yssj yssj,a.dxrr dxrr,a.dxrsj dxrsj,a.cyssj cyssj,a.cysyy cysyy,a.cdxrsj cdxrsj,a.cdxryy cdxryy,a.bhkyy bhkyy,a.yksfsh yksfsh from t_icksl a where 1=1
order by a.ryid,a.ickslid

select a.ryid ryid,a.ickslid ickslid,a.qyid qyid,a.hylbdm hylbdm,a.hylb hylb,a.kh kh,a.ickh ickh,a.slyy slyy,a.slr slr,a.slsj slsj,a.yxsksrq yxsksrq,a.yxqhzrq yxqhzrq,a.cjsj cjsj,a.cjr cjr,a.cjdbm cjdbm,a.cjdmc cjdmc,a.jssj jssj,a.jsbmc jsbmc,a.ffr ffr,a.ffsj ffsj,a.lqr lqr,a.lqsj lqsj,a.lqrzjlx lqrzjlx,a.lqrzjhm lqrzjhm,a.ickzxr ickzxr,a.ickzxsj ickzxsj,a.ickzxyy ickzxyy,a.njr njr,a.njsj njsj,a.zkztbs zkztbs,a.sfqr sfqr,a.ysr ysr,a.yssj yssj,a.dxrr dxrr,a.dxrsj dxrsj,a.cyssj cyssj,a.cysyy cysyy,a.cdxrsj cdxrsj,a.cdxryy cdxryy,a.bhkyy bhkyy,a.yksfsh yksfsh from t_icksl a where 1=1
order by a.ryid,a.ickslid

select a.ryid ryid,a.ickslid ickslid,a.qyid qyid,a.hylbdm hylbdm,a.hylb hylb,a.kh kh,a.ickh ickh,a.slyy slyy,a.slr slr,a.slsj slsj,a.yxsksrq yxsksrq,a.yxqhzrq yxqhzrq,a.cjsj cjsj,a.cjr cjr,a.cjdbm cjdbm,a.cjdmc cjdmc,a.jssj jssj,a.jsbmc jsbmc,a.ffr ffr,a.ffsj ffsj,a.lqr lqr,a.lqsj lqsj,a.lqrzjlx lqrzjlx,a.lqrzjhm lqrzjhm,a.ickzxr ickzxr,a.ickzxsj ickzxsj,a.ickzxyy ickzxyy,a.njr njr,a.njsj njsj,a.zkztbs zkztbs,a.sfqr sfqr,a.ysr ysr,a.yssj yssj,a.dxrr dxrr,a.dxrsj dxrsj,a.cyssj cyssj,a.cysyy cysyy,a.cdxrsj cdxrsj,a.cdxryy cdxryy,a.bhkyy bhkyy,a.yksfsh yksfsh from t_icksl a,t_qyryxx b,t_icksl_wldj c,t_wldj d where a.ryid=b.ryid and a.ickslid=c.ickslid and c.wlid=d.wlid and a.zkztbs='23'
select a.ryid ryid,a.ickslid ickslid,a.qyid qyid,a.kh kh,a.ickh ickh, a.cjdbm cjdbm,a.cjdmc cjdmc,a.zkztbs zkztbs,b.cyrybh cyrybh from t_icksl a,t_qyryxx b where a.ryid=b.ryid and b.scbz=0

select a.ryid ryid,a.ickslid ickslid,a.qyid qyid,a.hylbdm hylbdm,a.hylb hylb,a.kh kh,a.ickh ickh,a.slyy slyy,a.slr slr,a.slsj slsj,a.yxsksrq yxsksrq,a.yxqhzrq yxqhzrq,a.cjsj cjsj,a.cjr cjr,a.cjdbm cjdbm,a.cjdmc cjdmc,a.jssj jssj,a.jsbmc jsbmc,a.ffr ffr,a.ffsj ffsj,a.lqr lqr,a.lqsj lqsj,a.lqrzjlx lqrzjlx,a.lqrzjhm lqrzjhm,a.ickzxr ickzxr,a.ickzxsj ickzxsj,a.ickzxyy ickzxyy,a.njr njr,a.njsj njsj,a.zkztbs zkztbs,a.sfqr sfqr,a.ysr ysr,a.yssj yssj,a.dxrr dxrr,a.dxrsj dxrsj,a.cyssj cyssj,a.cysyy cysyy,a.cdxrsj cdxrsj,a.cdxryy cdxryy,a.bhkyy bhkyy,a.yksfsh yksfsh from t_icksl a,t_icksl_wldj b,t_wldj c where a.ickslid=b.ickslid and b.wlid=c.wlid

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from (select a.ryid ryid,a.ickslid ickslid,a.kh kh,a.ickh ickh,a.slyy slyy,a.slr slr,a.slsj slsj, a.yxsksrq yxsksrq,a.yxqhzrq yxqhzrq,a.cjsj cjsj,a.cjr cjr,a.cjdbm cjdbm,a.cjdmc cjdmc, a.jssj jssj,a.jsbmc jsbmc,a.ffr ffr,a.ffsj ffsj,a.lqr lqr,a.lqsj lqsj,a.lqrzjlx lqrzjlx, a.lqrzjhm lqrzjhm,a.ickzxr ickzxr,a.ickzxsj ickzxsj,a.ickzxyy ickzxyy,a.njr njr, a.njsj njsj,a.zkztbs zkztbs,a.sfqr sfqr,a.ysr ysr,a.yssj yssj,a.dxrr dxrr,a.dxrsj dxrsj, a.cyssj cyssj,a.cysyy cysyy,a.cdxrsj cdxrsj,a.cdxryy cdxryy,a.bhkyy bhkyy,a.yksfsh yksfsh, d.xm xm ,d.zjhm zjhm ,d.csrq csrq ,d.hjdxzqhdm hjdxzqhdm,d.hjdxzqh hjdxzqh,d.zt zt,b.wlbzkztbs wlbzkztbs from t_icksl a,t_icksl_wldj b,t_wldj c,t_qyryxx d where a.ickslid=b.ickslid and b.wlid=c.wlid and a.ryid=d.ryid
order by ${pageSort}) z) x where rowno >${beginRow} and rowno <= ${endRow}
select count(1) a from t_icksl a,t_icksl_wldj b,t_wldj c,t_qyryxx d where a.ickslid=b.ickslid and b.wlid=c.wlid and a.ryid=d.ryid

select a.ryid ryid,a.ickslid ickslid,a.kh kh,d.cyrybh cyrybh, d.xm xm ,d.xb xb,d.gj gj,d.zjhm zjhm ,d.csrq csrq ,d.hjdxz hjdxz,a.zkztbs zkztbs,b.wlbzkztbs wlbzkztbs from t_icksl a,t_icksl_wldj b,t_wldj c,t_qyryxx d where a.ickslid=b.ickslid and b.wlid=c.wlid and a.ryid=d.ryid
order by d.cyrybh
select a.ickslid ickslid,a.zkztbs zkztbs,a.ryid ryid from t_icksl a where a.zkztbs <> '7' and a.zkztbs <> '9'

select a.ryid ryid,a.ickslid ickslid,a.qyid qyid,a.hylbdm hylbdm,a.hylb hylb,a.kh kh,a.ickh ickh,a.slyy slyy,a.slr slr,a.slsj slsj,a.yxsksrq yxsksrq,a.yxqhzrq yxqhzrq,a.cjsj cjsj,a.cjr cjr,a.cjdbm cjdbm,a.cjdmc cjdmc,a.jssj jssj,a.jsbmc jsbmc,a.ffr ffr,a.ffsj ffsj,a.lqr lqr,a.lqsj lqsj,a.lqrzjlx lqrzjlx,a.lqrzjhm lqrzjhm,a.ickzxr ickzxr,a.ickzxsj ickzxsj,a.ickzxyy ickzxyy,a.njr njr,a.njsj njsj,a.zkztbs zkztbs,a.sfqr sfqr,a.ysr ysr,a.yssj yssj,a.dxrr dxrr,a.dxrsj dxrsj,a.cyssj cyssj,a.cysyy cysyy,a.cdxrsj cdxrsj,a.cdxryy cdxryy,a.bhkyy bhkyy,a.yksfsh yksfsh from t_icksl a,t_qyryxx b, t_icksl_wldj c, t_wldj d where c.wlid = d.wlid and a.ickslid = c.ickslid and b.ryid = a.ryid and b.scbz = 0 and a.zkztbs in ('24','6','7','8','9') and d.wlid = #{wlid}

select a.ryid ryid,a.ickslid ickslid,a.kh kh,a.ickh ickh,a.slyy slyy,a.slr slr,a.slsj slsj, a.yxsksrq yxsksrq,a.yxqhzrq yxqhzrq,a.cjsj cjsj,a.cjr cjr,a.cjdbm cjdbm,a.cjdmc cjdmc, a.jssj jssj,a.jsbmc jsbmc,a.ffr ffr,a.ffsj ffsj,a.lqr lqr,a.lqsj lqsj,a.lqrzjlx lqrzjlx, a.lqrzjhm lqrzjhm,a.ickzxr ickzxr,a.ickzxsj ickzxsj,a.ickzxyy ickzxyy,a.njr njr,a.njsj njsj, a.zkztbs zkztbs,a.sfqr sfqr,a.ysr ysr,a.yssj yssj,a.dxrr dxrr,a.dxrsj dxrsj,a.cyssj cyssj, a.cysyy cysyy,a.cdxrsj cdxrsj,a.cdxryy cdxryy,a.bhkyy bhkyy,a.yksfsh yksfsh, b.qyid,b.hylbdm hylbdm,b.cyrybh,b.cylb,b.cylbdm,b.xm,b.xbdm,b.xb,b.cyzjdm,b.cyzj,b.zjhm,b.zt,b.mzdm,b.minzu, b.csrq,b.hjdxzqh,b.hjdxzqhdm,b.gjdm,b.gj,b.hjdxz,e.qybm,e.qymc,f.ywx,f.ywm,f.wgrjyxkz from t_icksl a,t_qyryxx b, t_icksl_wldj c, t_wldj d,t_qyjbxx e,t_wgcyryxx f where c.wlid = d.wlid and a.ickslid = c.ickslid and b.ryid = a.ryid and b.ryid=f.ryid(+) and b.qyid=e.qyid and b.scbz = 0
select a.cjdbm from t_icksl a where a.zkztbs = '5'

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from (select a.ryid,a.ickslid,a.kh,a.zkztbs, b.qyid,b.cyrybh,b.cyrylbdm,b.xm,b.xbdm,b.xb,b.zjhm,b.csrq,b.gjdm,b.gj, d.qybm,d.qymc from t_icksl a,t_qyryxx b,t_wgcyryxx c,t_qyjbxx d where a.ryid=b.ryid and b.ryid=c.ryid(+) and b.qyid=d.qyid and b.scbz=0 and d.scbz=0
order by ${pageSort}) z) x where rowno >${beginRow} and rowno <= ${endRow}
select count(1) a from t_icksl a,t_qyryxx b,t_wgcyryxx c,t_qyjbxx d where a.ryid=b.ryid and b.ryid=c.ryid(+) and b.qyid=d.qyid and b.scbz=0 and d.scbz=0
select distinct d.qyid qyid,a.wlpc wlpc from t_wldj a, t_icksl_wldj b,t_icksl c,t_qyryxx d where a.wlid = b.wlid and b.ickslid =c.ickslid and c.ryid=d.ryid and a.wlpc = #{wlpc}
select d.cyrybh, d.xm, d.zjhm, e.qymc, c.slsj from t_wldj a, t_icksl_wldj b,t_icksl c, t_qyryxx d, t_qyjbxx e where a.wlid = b.wlid and b.ickslid = c.ickslid and c.ryid=d.ryid and d.qyid = e.qyid

select a.ryid ryid,a.ickslid ickslid,a.qyid qyid,a.slsj slsj,a.hylbdm hylbdm,a.hylb hylb, a.cjdbm cjdbm,a.cjdmc cjdmc,a.zkztbs zkztbs,b.zjhm zjhm,b.cyrybh cyrybh,b.xm xm from t_icksl a,t_qyryxx b where a.ryid = b.ryid and b.scbz=0
and a.zkztbs='2'
order by a.ickslid
order by a.cjdbm
order by a.ickslid

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from (select a.qyid, a.ryid, a.zpwtgyy, b.ickslid, b.kh,c.tpnr from t_qyryxx a, t_icksl b, t_qyry_zp c,t_qyjbxx d where a.ryid = b.ryid and a.qyid=d.qyid and a.ryid = c.ryid and c.tpnr is not null and c.tplx = '0' and a.scbz=0 and a.zxbz='0'
order by ${pageSort}) z) x where rowno >${beginRow} and rowno <= ${endRow}
select count(1) a from t_qyryxx a, t_icksl b, t_qyry_zp c,t_qyjbxx d where a.ryid = b.ryid and a.qyid=d.qyid and a.ryid = c.ryid and c.tpnr is not null and c.tplx = '0' and a.scbz=0 and a.zxbz='0'

select a.qyid,a.ryid, b.ickslid from t_qyryxx a, t_icksl b, t_qyry_zp c,t_qyjbxx d where a.ryid = b.ryid and a.qyid=d.qyid and a.ryid = c.ryid and c.tpnr is not null and c.tplx = '0' and a.scbz=0 and a.zxbz='0'

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from (select a.ryid,a.ickslid,b.qyid,a.kh,a.zkztbs,a.slsj,a.cjdbm,a.cjdmc, b.cyrybh,b.xm,b.xbdm,b.xb,b.zjhm,e.pch,b.cyrylbdm from t_icksl a,t_qyryxx b, (select t1.pch,t2.ickslid,max(t1.zbid) zbid from t_ickzb t1, t_icksl_ickzb t2 where t1.zbid=t2.zbid group by t1.pch,ickslid )e where a.ryid=b.ryid and a.ickslid=e.ickslid(+) and b.scbz=0
order by ${pageSort}) z) x where rowno >${beginRow} and rowno <= ${endRow}

select count(1) a from t_icksl a,t_qyryxx b, (select t1.pch,t2.ickslid,max(t1.zbid) zbid from t_ickzb t1, t_icksl_ickzb t2 where t1.zbid=t2.zbid group by t1.pch,ickslid )e where a.ryid=b.ryid and a.ickslid=e.ickslid(+) and b.scbz=0

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from (select a.ryid ryid , a.ickslid ickslid , a.kh kh , a.zkztbs zkztbs , b.qyid qyid, b.cyrybh cyrybh, b.xm xm, b.xbdm xbdm, b.xb xb, b.gj gj, b.gjdm gjdm, b.zjhm zjhm, a.yxqhzrq yxqhzrq , b.cyrylbdm cyrylbdm from t_icksl a,t_qyryxx b where a.ryid=b.ryid and b.scbz=0
order by ${pageSort}) z) x where rowno >${beginRow} and rowno <= ${endRow}
select count(1) a from t_icksl a,t_qyryxx b where a.ryid=b.ryid and b.scbz=0

select d.ryid, d.cyrybh, d.xm, d.zjhm, d.xbdm,d.xb, d.minzu,d.mzdm, d.gjdm,d.gj, d.csrq, d.hjdxzqh,d.hjdxzqhdm,d.hjdxz, c.yxsksrq,c.yxqhzrq,c.kh,c.ickslid, (case when (c.zkztbs = '7' or c.zkztbs = '8' or c.zkztbs = '9') then '1' else '0' end) sfzx, (case when (c.zkztbs = '7' or c.zkztbs = '8' or c.zkztbs = '9') then '是' else '否' end) sfzxmc, e.ywx,e.ywm,e.wgrjyxkz from t_icksl c,t_qyryxx d,t_wgcyryxx e where c.ryid=d.ryid and d.ryid=e.ryid(+)
and c.zkztbs='5'

select b.ryid ryid, a.ickslid ickslid, a.kh kh, a.zkztbs zkztbs, b.cyrybh cyrybh, a.ickh ickh from (select ryid, ickslid, kh, zkztbs, ickh from t_icksl where ickslid in (select max(ickslid) from t_icksl group by ryid)) a, t_qyryxx b where a.ryid=b.ryid and b.scbz=0 and (a.zkztbs ='6' or a.zkztbs ='7' or a.zkztbs ='9')

select x.* from (select rownum rowno, z.* from ( select substr(a.cjdbm,0,7) ssdsbm,b.departname ssdsmc,
'' ssdsbm,'' ssdsmc,
a.cjdbm cjdbm,a.cjdmc cjdmc,a.hylbdm hylbdm,a.hylb hylb,
'' cjdbm,'' cjdmc,a.hylbdm hylbdm,a.hylb hylb,
sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('6','10','11','20','21','22','23','24','25') then 1 else 0 end) yfssl, sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('6','11','20','21','22','23','24','25') then 1 else 0 end) yfksl, sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('6','20','21','22','23','24','25') then 1 else 0 end) yzksl, sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('11') then 1 else 0 end) fksbsl, sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('6') then 1 else 0 end) yffsl from t_icksl a,t_department b,t_qyryxx c where 1 = 1 and substr(a.cjdbm,0,7) = b.departcode and a.ryid=c.ryid and c.scbz=0
order by ${pageSort}) z) x where rowno >${beginRow} and rowno <= ${endRow}

select count(1) a from (select substr(a.cjdbm,0,7) ssdsbm,
'' ssdsbm,'' ssdsmc,
a.cjdbm cjdbm,a.cjdmc cjdmc,
'' cjdbm,'' cjdmc,
sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('6','10','11','20','21','22','23','24','25') then 1 else 0 end) yfssl, sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('6','11','20','21','22','23','24','25') then 1 else 0 end) yfksl, sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('6','20','21','22','23','24','25') then 1 else 0 end) yzksl, sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('11') then 1 else 0 end) fksbsl, sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('6') then 1 else 0 end) yffsl from t_icksl a where 1 = 1
)a

select x.* from (select rownum rowno, z.* from ( select sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('6','10','11','20','21','22','23','24','25') then 1 else 0 end) yfssl, sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('6','11','20','21','22','23','24','25') then 1 else 0 end) yfksl, sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('6','20','21','22','23','24','25') then 1 else 0 end) yzksl, sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('11') then 1 else 0 end) fksbsl, sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('6') then 1 else 0 end) yffsl from t_icksl a where 1 = 1
group by a.cjdbm) z) x where rowno >${beginRow} and rowno <= ${endRow}

select count(1) from (select sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('6','10','11','20','21','22','23','24','25') then 1 else 0 end) yfssl, sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('6','11','20','21','22','23','24','25') then 1 else 0 end) yfksl, sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('6','20','21','22','23','24','25') then 1 else 0 end) yzksl, sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('11') then 1 else 0 end) fksbsl, sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('6') then 1 else 0 end) yffsl from t_icksl a where 1 = 1
group by a.cjdbm )

select b.xm xm, b.zjhm zjhm, b.xb xb, b.xbdm xbdm, b.minzu minzu, b.mzdm mzdm, b.csrq csrq, b.hjdxzqh hjdxzqh, b.hjdxzqhdm hjdxzqhdm, b.hjdxz hjdxz, b.gj gj, b.gjdm gjdm, c.ywx ywx, c.ywm ywm, c.wgrjyxkz wgrjyxkz, c.qzhm qzhm, p.tpnr tpnr, a.yxsksrq yxsksrq, a.yxqhzrq yxqhzrq, a.zkztbs zkztbs, a.kh kh from t_icksl a, t_qyryxx b, t_wgcyryxx c, t_qyry_zp p where 1 = 1 and a.qyid = b.qyid and a.qyid =p.qyid and a.qyid= c.qyid(+) and a.ryid = b.ryid and a.ryid = p.ryid and a.ryid= c.ryid(+) and a.kh = #{kh}
and b.cyrybh = #{cyrybh}
select a.kh kh ,a.zkztbs zkztbs from t_icksl a where a.kh in ( ${stringkh} )

select c.* from (select a.ryid ryid,a.ickslid ickslid,a.qyid qyid,a.hylbdm hylbdm,a.hylb hylb,a.kh kh,a.ickh ickh,a.slyy slyy,a.slr slr,a.slsj slsj,a.yxsksrq yxsksrq,a.yxqhzrq yxqhzrq,a.cjsj cjsj,a.cjr cjr,a.cjdbm cjdbm,a.cjdmc cjdmc,a.jssj jssj,a.jsbmc jsbmc,a.ffr ffr,a.ffsj ffsj,a.lqr lqr,a.lqsj lqsj,a.lqrzjlx lqrzjlx,a.lqrzjhm lqrzjhm,a.ickzxr ickzxr,a.ickzxsj ickzxsj,a.ickzxyy ickzxyy,a.njr njr,a.njsj njsj,a.zkztbs zkztbs,a.sfqr sfqr,a.ysr ysr,a.yssj yssj,a.dxrr dxrr,a.dxrsj dxrsj,a.cyssj cyssj,a.cysyy cysyy,a.cdxrsj cdxrsj,a.cdxryy cdxryy,a.bhkyy bhkyy,a.yksfsh yksfsh from t_icksl a,t_qyryxx b where a.ryid=b.ryid ) c where c.ickslid= (select max(ickslid) from t_icksl a,t_qyryxx b where a.ryid=b.ryid )
mapper.update:
update t_icksl a set a.ickslid=a.ickslid
where a.ickslid=#{ickslid}
mapper.select:
select sum(case when b.zkztbs >=2 then 1 else 0 end) yshzpsl, sum(case when b.zkztbs >=3 then 1 else 0 end) yzbsl, sum(case when b.zkztbs >=4 then 1 else 0 end) yyssl, sum(case when b.zkztbs >=5 then 1 else 0 end) ydxrsl, sum(case when b.zkztbs >=23 then 1 else 0 end) ickwlyfssl, sum(case when b.zkztbs >=20 then 1 else 0 end) ickwlyzbsl, sum(case when b.zkztbs >=24 then 1 else 0 end) ickwlyjssl,
sum(case when b.zkztbs =2 then 1 else 0 end) dzbsl, sum(case when b.zkztbs =3 then 1 else 0 end) dyssl, sum(case when b.zkztbs =4 then 1 else 0 end) ddxrsl from t_qyryxx a, t_icksl b, t_qyry_zp c where a.ryid = b.ryid(+) and a.ryid = c.ryid(+)

select x.* from (select rownum rowno, z.* from ( select ssdsbm, ssdsmc, cjdbm, cjdmc, qysl, rysl, yslick, yfssl, yfksl, yzksl, fksbsl, yffsl from (select substr(a.cjdbm,0,7) ssdsbm,b.departname ssdsmc,
'' ssdsbm,'' ssdsmc,
a.cjdbm cjdbm,a.cjdmc cjdmc,
'' cjdbm,'' cjdmc,
sum(case when a.zkztbs >=1 then 1 else 0 end) yslick, sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('6','10','11','20','21','22','23','24','25') then 1 else 0 end) yfssl, sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('6','11','20','21','22','23','24','25') then 1 else 0 end) yfksl, sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('6','20','21','22','23','24','25') then 1 else 0 end) yzksl, sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('11') then 1 else 0 end) fksbsl, sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('6') then 1 else 0 end) yffsl from t_icksl a
,t_department b
where 1 = 1 and substr(a.cjdbm,0,7) = b.departcode
) k, (select count(c.qyid) qysl,c.lrdwbm from t_qyjbxx c group by c.lrdwbm) q, (select count(d.ryid) rysl,d.lrdwbm from t_qyryxx d group by d.lrdwbm) r where k.cjdbm = q.lrdwbm(+) and k.cjdbm = r.lrdwbm(+)
order by ${pageSort}) z) x where rowno >${beginRow} and rowno <= ${endRow}

select count(1) from (select substr(a.cjdbm,0,7) ssdsbm,b.departname ssdsmc,
'' ssdsbm,'' ssdsmc,
a.cjdbm cjdbm,a.cjdmc cjdmc,
'' cjdbm,'' cjdmc,
sum(case when a.zkztbs >=1 then 1 else 0 end) yslick, sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('6','10','11','20','21','22','23','24','25') then 1 else 0 end) yfssl, sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('6','11','20','21','22','23','24','25') then 1 else 0 end) yfksl, sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('6','20','21','22','23','24','25') then 1 else 0 end) yzksl, sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('11') then 1 else 0 end) fksbsl, sum(case when a.zkztbs in ('6') then 1 else 0 end) yffsl from t_icksl a
,t_department b
where 1 = 1 and substr(a.cjdbm,0,7) = b.departcode
) k, (select count(c.qyid) qysl,c.lrdwbm from t_qyjbxx c group by c.lrdwbm) q, (select count(d.ryid) rysl,d.lrdwbm from t_qyryxx d group by d.lrdwbm) r where k.cjdbm = q.lrdwbm(+) and k.cjdbm = r.lrdwbm(+)

select sum(tz.ytjcssl) ytjcssl, sum(tz.wtjcssl) wtjcssl, sum(tz.ycjcssl) ycjcssl, sum(tz.ycjrysl) ycjrysl, sum(tz.ytjrysl) ytjrysl, sum(tz.wtjrysl) wtjrysl, sum(tz.yslick) yslick, sum(tz.yffsl) yffsl, sum(tz.yjswlbsl) yjswlbsl, sum(tz.yzxicksl) yzxicksl, sum(tz.bhicksl) bhicksl, sum(tz.dfficksl) dfficksl, sum(tz.dbhicksl) dbhicksl, sum(tz.wlbbfjs) wlbbfjs, sum(tz.wlbjsbcg) wlbjsbcg from ( select NVL(b.ytjcssl,'0') ytjcssl, NVL(b.wtjcssl,'0') wtjcssl, NVL(b.ycjcssl,'0') ycjcssl, NVL(c.ytjrysl,'0') ytjrysl, NVL(c.wtjrysl,'0') wtjrysl, NVL(c.ycjrysl,'0') ycjrysl, NVL(a.yslick,'0') yslick, NVL(a.yffsl,'0') yffsl, NVL(d.yjswlbsl,'0') yjswlbsl, NVL(a.yzxicksl,'0') yzxicksl, NVL(a.bhicksl,'0') bhicksl, NVL(a.dfficksl,'0') dfficksl, NVL(a.dbhicksl,'0') dbhicksl, NVL(d.wlbbfjs,'0') wlbbfjs, NVL(d.wlbjsbcg,'0') wlbjsbcg from (select ic.cjdbm cjdbm, sum(case when (ic.bhkyy is null or ic.bhkyy <> '04') then 1 else 0 end) yslick, sum(case when ic.zkztbs in ('6','7','8','9') then 1 else 0 end) yffsl,
sum(case when ic.zkztbs in ('7','8','9') then 1 else 0 end) yzxicksl, sum(case when ic.zkztbs in ('9') then 1 else 0 end) bhicksl, sum(case when ic.zkztbs in ('24') then 1 else 0 end) dfficksl, sum(case when ic.zkztbs in ('6') then 1 else 0 end) dbhicksl from t_icksl ic,t_qyryxx ry,t_wgcyryxx wg,t_qyjbxx qy where ic.ryid=ry.ryid and ry.ryid=wg.ryid(+) and ry.qyid=qy.qyid and ry.scbz=0 and qy.scbz=0 and ic.zkztbs <90 and ry.zt <90 and qy.zt <90 group by ic.cjdbm) a, (select sum(case when zt in ('1','2','3') then 1 else 0 end) ytjcssl, sum(case when (zt='0' and scbz = 0) then 1 else 0 end) wtjcssl, sum(case when (scbz = 0 and zt <90) then 1 else 0 end) ycjcssl, lrdwbm from t_qyjbxx where 1=1 group by lrdwbm) b, (select sum(case when (r.zt in ('1','2','3','4','5','6','7') and r.scbz = '0') then 1 else 0 end) ytjrysl, sum(case when (r.zt ='0' and r.scbz = '0') then 1 else 0 end) wtjrysl, sum(case when (r.scbz = '0' and r.zt <90 and q.zt <90) then 1 else 0 end) ycjrysl, r.lrdwbm lrdwbm from t_qyryxx r,t_qyjbxx q,(select ryid from t_qyry_zp where tplx = '0' and tpnr is not null) zp where r.qyid = q.qyid and r.ryid = zp.ryid group by r.lrdwbm) c, (select sum(case when ztdm in ('2') then 1 else 0 end) wlbbfjs, sum(case when ztdm in ('4') then 1 else 0 end) wlbjsbcg, sum(case when ztdm in ('3') then 1 else 0 end) yjswlbsl, mbsldbh from t_wldj where 1=1 group by mbsldbh) d where b.lrdwbm = c.lrdwbm(+) and c.lrdwbm = a.cjdbm(+) and a.cjdbm = d.mbsldbh(+) )tz

select a.ryid ryid, b.cyrybh cyrybh,a.kh kh,a.ickslid ickslid from t_icksl a, t_qyryxx b where 1=1 and a.ryid=b.ryid and b.scbz=0 and a.ickslid in (select max(ickslid) from t_icksl t where t.zkztbs in ('6', '7', '8', '9') and ickh = #{ickh} group by ickh)

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from (select a.ryid,a.qyid,a.cyrybh,a.cyrylbdm,a.cyrylbmc,a.gwbh,a.gwmc,a.xm,a.xbdm,a.xb,a.cyzjdm,a.cyzj,a.zjhm,a.zt,a.lrsj lrsj, c.qymc qymc,c.qybm qybm,a.hylbdm hylbdm,a.hylb hylb,a.cylb cylb,a.cylbdm cylbdm from t_qyryxx a, t_icksl b,t_qyjbxx c,t_wgcyryxx d where b.ryid = a.ryid and a.ryid = d.ryid(+) and a.qyid = c.qyid and a.scbz=0 and c.scbz=0 and (b.bhkyy is null or b.bhkyy <> '04')
order by ${pageSort}) z) x where rowno >${beginRow} and rowno <= ${endRow}

select count(1) a from t_qyryxx a, t_icksl b,t_qyjbxx c,t_wgcyryxx d where b.ryid = a.ryid and a.ryid = d.ryid(+) and a.qyid = c.qyid and a.scbz=0 and c.scbz=0 and (b.bhkyy is null or b.bhkyy <> '04')
